nodes.text: The Kro Var system was a star system that was located in the Unknown Regions.

During the New Sith Wars, a group of refugees that were fleeing the Ruusan campaign accidentally traveled to the system when their starship left hyperspace at the wrong co-ordinates. They crashed on the planet Kro Var and the survivors organized themselves into clans. The system was later discovered by the Galactic Republic.
